item.createaddition.diamond_grit_sandpap: Applies polish to items held in the _offhand_ or lying on the _floor_ when _looking at them_
item.createaddition.spool.tooltip.behavi: Will remove the wire link and return a filled _spool_.
item.createaddition.diamond_grit_sandpap: Can be used to _refine materials_. The process can be automated with a Deployer.
